name: Clean-Up 3D
description:
In a world full of waste, two vacuum cleaners join forces to save the world.

Guide them in their journey and help them clean up all islands from the litter in order to make them shine again!

Features:
· Beautiful 3D pixel artwork
· Stress-free gameplay
· Simple one-touch controls
· Easy to pick up for all ages
· Haptic feedback for more fun
· Full compatibility for all iOS devices

Can you clean up all islands?
Share your progress on your favorite social platform and tag:
#TrashTag Challenge
#Detrashed
